title: Personal -_.Data Response
description: The response from a commerce microservice for personal data information.

data.title: Personal Data Array
data.description: The array of the personal data.

businessContactInformation.title: Business Contact Information
businessContactInformation.description: Details of how to contact an individual when acting as a worker, such as telephone number, email address and mailing address.

customerIdentifier.title: Customer Identifier
customerIdentifier.description: Identifier assigned by a Organization to a Customer.

employeeNumber.title: Employee Number
employeeNumber.description: An identifier by which the Employee is known to the Organization.

employeeSerialNumber.title: Employee Serial Number
employeeSerialNumber.description: Employee Serial Number is a six digit number that is assigned to personnel by employee and contractor management systems.

employeeName.title: Employee Name
employeeName.description: IBM Employee First and Last Name. SAP Abbreviation: ZZEMPL_NAME

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.description: The first or given name of a person.

fullName.title: Full Name
fullName.description: The complete name of a person.

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.description: The last or family name of a person.

electronicAddress.title: Electronic Address
electronicAddress.description: A non-physical, virtual address. Could be an e-mail, ftp, URL, etc.

electronicAddressDomain.title: Electronic Address Domain
electronicAddressDomain.description: An Electronic Address of Electronic Address Domain which provides a segmentation of e-mail addresses into the common parts of the address which represents a service or network provider.

emailAddress.title: Email Address
emailAddress.description: The string used to specify the source or destination of an electronic mail message.

nonemployeeContactInformation.title: Non-Employee Contact Information
nonemployeeContactInformation.description: Information which details the way in which an individual (who is not an employee of the organization) can be reached. Examples include mailing address, telephone number and email address

personalContactInformation.title: Personal Contact Information
personalContactInformation.description: Information which details the way in which an individual can be reached. Examples include mailing address, telephone number and email address

surname.title: Surname
surname.description: An Involved Party Name Component which is that part of a name which belongs to the family the Individual is a part of; for example, Smith, Mueller.

homePhoneNumber.title: Home Phone Number
homePhoneNumber.description: A unique telephone number which identifies the person's home connection to the telephone network.

mobilePhoneNumber.title: Mobile Phone Number
mobilePhoneNumber.description: A unique telephone number which identifies the person's connection to the cellular telephone network.

city.title: City
city.description: A Geographic Area that is a municipality with legal power granted by a state charter.

country.title: Country
country.description: The set of geopolitical nations as recognized by the coding system managed by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO).

county.title: County
county.description: A territorial division exercising administrative, judicial, and political functions in some countries where English is the national language. County designated on the Address as defined by the local postal authority.

homeStreetAddress.title: Home Street Address
homeStreetAddress.description: A street address for where a person considers home.

legalAddress.title: Legal Address
legalAddress.description: An Address that is used for statutory purposes; for example, Real Property may be recorded as Lot 43 in Plot 62.

postalAddress.title: Postal Address
postalAddress.description: A mailing address used by postal services to deliver mail and packages to a location.

postcodeArea.title: Postcode Area
postcodeArea.description: A Geographic Area defined by postal authorities to facilitate mail delivery services; for example, the area defined by a Zip Code in the U.S..

province.title: Province
province.description: A Geographic Area that is a political subdivision of a country.

state.title: State
state.description: A Geographic Area that represents a first level legal and political subdivision of a country; for example, Virginia, Bavaria.

numberIdentifier.title: Number Identifier
numberIdentifier.description: A number that is used as an identifier.
